about.title: About Us - PT Inti Logam Persada
about.meta: Learn more about the history, vision, and mission of PT Inti Logam Persada in the metal manufacturing industry.
about.history_desc:
CV Inti Logam Persada is a company engaged in manufacturing and casting of Grey Cast Iron and Ductile Iron since 1997, located in Klaten, Central Java. The company focuses on the pipe fittings industry but also provides other products according to customer needs. For nearly 28 years, CV Inti Logam Persada has contributed to government programs through state-owned and private companies in building infrastructure and the economy in Indonesia, as well as meeting the needs of various industries.

In addition to focusing on product quality, we also care about the environment and surrounding communities. Through our CSR programs, we are committed to contributing to sustainable development and the welfare of communities around our operational locations.

As part of the manufacturing and casting industry in Indonesia, we are proud to play a role in building the nation's infrastructure and supporting national economic growth. We hope to continue collaborating with business partners, the government, and society to create a better future for Indonesia.
about.vision_desc: To become a trusted, competent, high-quality, and satisfying metal casting company.
about.mission_5: Make a positive impact on the surrounding environment.

services.title: Our Services - PT Inti Logam Persada
services.meta: Explore our metal manufacturing services, including CNC Machining, Fabrication, Welding, and Surface Finishing.
services.cnc_desc: Computerized machining process to create complex components with micron-level accuracy.
services.sheet_desc: Cutting, bending, and assembling sheet metal for various industrial applications.
services.welding_desc: Professional welding services (MIG, TIG) and final assembly for strong and neat construction.
services.finishing_desc: Finishing services such as powder coating, anodizing, and polishing for aesthetics and protection.

vision_mission.title: Vision & Mission
vision_mission.meta: Discover our vision and mission as a trusted manufacturing partner.
vision_mission.desc: Our vision is to be the best partner in the metal industry. Our mission is to deliver high-quality products and services through continuous improvement and innovation.

values.title: Company Values
values.meta: Our core values that drive our company culture and service.
values.desc:
We have a tagline: "Your Company Partner" which means as a company we aim for a good and long-term relationship and to continuously meet every customer need. To achieve this, CV Inti Logam Persada upholds the following company values:

1. Solution-Oriented
We are ready to find the best solutions for every challenge and are determined to provide effective and efficient solutions for our customers.

2. Collaborative
In every project, we encourage close collaboration between our internal team, partners, and customers.

3. Innovative
We continuously foster creativity and dare to think "out of the box" to create superior and relevant products and services.

4. Committed
We place customer needs as our top priority and are committed to always providing the best products and services for our partners and customers.

csr.title: CSR Program
csr.meta: Our commitment to social and environmental responsibility.
csr.desc:
At CV Inti Logam Persada, we believe that as members of society, we have a responsibility to contribute to the welfare and development of the communities around us. In addition to focusing on products and customers, we also care about the environment and surrounding communities.

Through our Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) programs, we are committed to being a positive agent of change in society and making meaningful contributions to social, economic, and environmental development in Indonesia. We hope to continue collaborating with various parties to create a sustainable impact for the communities and environment around us.
csr.item1: Social programs for communities around the factory.
